restaurants.name: Taniti Family Grill
restaurants.description: Family-friendly restaurant serving classic American fare. Kids menu available with smaller portions and familiar favorites. High chairs and booster seats provided.

restaurants.name: Island Diner
restaurants.description: Classic American diner with a tropical twist. Breakfast served all day. Generous portions and friendly service.

restaurants.name: Beach Burger Bar
restaurants.description: Casual burger joint on the beach. Perfect for a quick bite after a day of swimming. Known for creative burger combinations.

restaurants.name: The Fresh Catch
restaurants.description: Experience authentic Tanitian cuisine featuring the daily catch prepared in traditional styles. Beautiful harbor views complement the fresh seafood.

restaurants.name: Island Flavors
restaurants.description: Family-run restaurant serving traditional Tanitian dishes. Focus on fresh local fish and rice preparations.

restaurants.name: Seaside Seafood House
restaurants.description: Popular seafood restauran. Known for generous portions and beautiful sunset views over the water.

restaurants.name: Village Kitchen
restaurants.description: Small restaurant offering home-style Tanitian cooking. Uses ingredients from local farms and fishermen.

restaurants.name: Bay Bistro
restaurants.description: Upscale dining with modern takes on traditional Tanitian dishes. Creative fusion menu and extensive wine list.

restaurants.name: Lotus Garden
restaurants.description: Contemporary Pan-Asian restaurant with diverse menu spanning multiple Asian cuisines. Fresh sushi bar and excellent vegetarian options.

restaurants.name: Spice Route
restaurants.description: Flavorful Pan-Asian cuisine featuring dishes from Thailand, Vietnam, and Indonesia. Spice levels can be adjusted to your preference.

medical: Several clinics available across the island
safety: Violent crime is very rare on Taniti
Some pickpocketing reported in tourist areas - stay aware
Keep valuables secure in hotel safes
currency: Euros and yen also accepted at many businesses
language: Many young Tanitians speak fluent English
English less common in rural areas and among older residents
importantDetails: Many national holidays - attractions may be closed, plan accordingly
